title: Bloomberg Markets: Haworth on Energy Demand Outlook Brightens
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Haworth on Energy Demand Outlook Brightens
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Rob Haworth Senior Investment Strategist US Bank Discussing rise in oil after the International Energy Agency and OPEC boosted their forecasts for crude demand.
